name: Totse.info Classic
description: Rearranges the forum layout to better resemble to original Totse layout.  I hate the way the site presently looks.
additional_info:
Version 1

Probably the only version I'll ever make as I like Zoklet better than Totse.info.  I only ever go to Totse.info when Zoklet is down for a while.

You might have to change parts of the CSS to fit your screen resolution, since I'm too lazy to fix it now that Zoklet is back.
